title: Product Catalogue
description: A list of items from the product catalogue.

eacode.description: The unique identifier of the item.

trigram.description: A trigram string associated to an item. Should be unique but exceptions exist.

productName.description: The full name of the item.

productManager.description: First name and last name of the product manager.

productOwner.description: First name and last name of the product owner.

crownJewelsLevel.description: The Crown Jewel category associated to the product.

rtoLevel.description: The RTO category associated to the product.

provideEnterpriseServiceFlag.description: Does the product aims at providing enterprise services capabilities?

webExposureFlag.description: Is the product exposed to Internet?

makeOrBuyCategory.description: Is the product an internal development, a bought product or a bought and customised product?

flaggedToBeDeleted.description: Is the product flagged for being decommissioned soon?

sonarQubeProjectIds.description: A list of SonarQube ids associated with the product.
